TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AccessibleStates extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定數值，代表可存取物件的可能狀態。

span.span: Specifies values representing possible states for an accessible object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可存取的物件可以與一或多個這些狀態相關聯。An accessible object can be associated with one or more of these states. 如需協助工具應用程式的詳細資訊，請參閱 < 在 Microsoft Developer Network (MSDN) 文件庫中的 「 Microsoft Active Accessibility" http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information about the accessibility application, see "Microsoft Active Accessibility" in the Microsoft Developer Network (MSDN) library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立協助工具感知的圖表控制項，使用和類別可公開存取的資訊。The following code example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控制項會繪製圖例以及兩個曲線。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別，衍生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，會在方法，以提供針對 chart 控制項的自訂存取資訊。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因為圖表圖例不是根據實際控制，但改為繪製由圖表控制項，它不包含任何內建的可存取資訊。Because the chart legend is not an actual control based on , but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not contain any built-in accessible information. 基於這個原因，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別會覆寫方法來傳回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，表示圖例的每個部分的存取資訊。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 當存取感知的應用程式會使用這個控制項時，控制項可以提供所需的存取資訊。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 此程式碼摘錄會示範如何使用列舉型別與屬性。This code excerpt demonstrates using the enumeration with the property. 請參閱類別的完整程式碼範例的概觀。See the class overview for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CPP/chartcontrol.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CS/chartcontrol.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/VB/chartcontrol.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates AlertHigh = int32(268435456)
AlertHigh = 268435456

summary.span: 應立刻傳達給使用者的重要資訊。

span.span: The important information that should be conveyed to the user immediately.

summary.span: 例如，剩餘電量指示器 (Indicator) 到達關鍵性的低電位時就會轉換成這個狀態，這種情況下，盲目存取公用程式會立刻向使用者宣告這項資訊，而且螢幕縮放程式會捲動螢幕，讓電量指示器進入檢視當中。

span.span: For example, a battery-level indicator reaching a critical low level would transition to this state, in which case, a blind access utility would announce this information immediately to the user, and a screen magnification program would scroll the screen so that the battery indicator is in view.

summary.span: 這個狀態也適用於必須先完成，使用者才能夠繼續的任何提示或作業。

span.span: This state is also appropriate for any prompt or operation that must be completed before the user can continue.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates AlertLow = int32(67108864)
AlertLow = 67108864

summary.span: 對使用者可能並不重要的低優先權資訊。

span.span: The low-priority information that might not be important to the user.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates AlertMedium = int32(134217728)
AlertMedium = 134217728

summary.span: 不必立刻傳達給使用者的重要資訊。

span.span: The important information that does not need to be conveyed to the user immediately.

summary.span: 例如，剩餘電量指示器開始達到低電位時，可產生中級的警告。

span.span: For example, when a battery-level indicator is starting to reach a low level, it could generate a medium-level alert.

summary.span: 然後盲目存取公用程式就會產生聲響，讓使用者知道有重要資訊，而不真正中斷使用者的工作。

span.span: Blind access utilities could then generate a sound to let the user know that important information is available, without actually interrupting the user's work.

summary.span: 使用者就可以在所選擇的時間隨時查詢警告資訊。

span.span: Users can then query the alert information any time they choose.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates Animated = int32(16384)
Animated = 16384

summary.span: 快速或經常要變更外觀的物件。

span.span: The object that rapidly or constantly changes appearance.

summary.span: 偶爾但並非一定會使用動畫效果的圖形，應該定義成 。

span.span: Graphics that are occasionally animated, but not always, should be defined as .

summary.span: 此一狀態不應該用於指示物件變位置。

span.span: This state should not be used to indicate that the object's location is changing.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates Busy = int32(2048)
Busy = 2048

summary.span: 無法在目前的條件中接受輸入的控制項。

span.span: A control that cannot accept input in its current condition.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates Checked = int32(16)
Checked = 16

summary.span: 具有選定核取方塊的物件。

span.span: An object with a selected check box.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates Collapsed = int32(1024)
Collapsed = 1024

summary.span: 是大綱或樹狀結構中之項目的物件隱藏子系。

span.span: The hidden children of the object that are items in an outline or tree structure.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates Default = int32(256)
Default = 256

summary.span: 預設按鈕或功能表項目。

span.span: The default button or menu item.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates Expanded = int32(512)
Expanded = 512

summary.span: 是大綱或樹狀結構中之項目的物件顯示子系。

span.span: The displayed children of the object that are items in an outline or tree structure.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates ExtSelectable = int32(33554432)
ExtSelectable = 33554432

summary.span: 變更的選取項目會使選取項目錨點 (也就是具有鍵盤焦點的物件) 之間的所有物件和這個物件取得錨點物件的選取項目狀態。

span.span: The altered selection such that all objects between the selection anchor, which is the object with the keyboard focus, and this object take on the anchor object's selection state.

summary.span: 如果不選取錨點物件，物件會從選取項目移除。

span.span: If the anchor object is not selected, the objects are removed from the selection.

summary.span: 如果選取錨點物件，選取項目會擴充，來包含這個物件和之間所有的物件。

span.span: If the anchor object is selected, the selection is extended to include this object and all objects in between.

summary.span: 您可以將這個和 或 組合，來設定選取項目的狀態。

span.span: You can set the selection state by combining this with or .

summary.span: 這個狀態除非與 組合，否則不會變更焦點或選取項目的錨點。

span.span: This state does not change the focus or the selection anchor unless it is combined with .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates Floating = int32(4096)
Floating = 4096

summary.span: 不固定在父物件之界限的物件和不隨著父系自動移動的物件。

span.span: The object that is not fixed to the boundary of its parent object and that does not move automatically along with the parent.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates Focusable = int32(1048576)
Focusable = 1048576

summary.span: 使用中視窗上可接收鍵盤焦點的物件。

span.span: The object on the active window that can receive keyboard focus.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates Focused = int32(4)
Focused = 4

summary.span: 具有鍵盤焦點的物件。

span.span: An object with the keyboard focus.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates HasPopup = int32(1073741824)
HasPopup = 1073741824

summary.span: 物件被叫用時會顯示快顯功能表或視窗。

span.span: The object displays a pop-up menu or window when invoked.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates HotTracked = int32(128)
HotTracked = 128

summary.span: 滑鼠熱點追蹤的物件，表示它的外觀反白顯示，來指示出滑鼠指標位在它的上方。

span.span: The object hot-tracked by the mouse, meaning its appearance is highlighted to indicate the mouse pointer is located over it.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates Indeterminate = int32(32)
Indeterminate = 32

summary.span: 狀態不定的三態核取方塊或工具列按鈕。

span.span: A three-state check box or toolbar button whose state is indeterminate.

summary.span: 核取方塊不是已選取也不是未核取，是在第三種或混合狀態中。

span.span: The check box is neither checked nor unchecked, and it is in the third or mixed state.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates Invisible = int32(32768)
Invisible = 32768

summary.span: 沒有可見的使用者介面的物件。

span.span: An object without a visible user interface.

Linked = 4194304

summary.span: 先前尚未選取的已連結物件。

span.span: A linked object that has not been previously selected.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates Marqueed = int32(8192)
Marqueed = 8192

summary.span: 具有捲動或移動文字或圖形的物件。

span.span: An object with scrolling or moving text or graphics.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates Mixed = int32(32)
Mixed = 32

summary.span: 狀態不定的三態核取方塊或工具列按鈕。

span.span: A three-state check box or toolbar button whose state is indeterminate.

summary.span: 核取方塊不是已選取也不是未核取，是在第三種或混合狀態中。

span.span: The check box is neither checked nor unchecked, and it is in the third or mixed state.

Moveable = 262144

span.span: A movable object.

MultiSelectable = 16777216

None = 0

summary.span: 沒有狀態。

span.span: No state.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates Offscreen = int32(65536)
Offscreen = 65536

summary.span: 沒有螢幕上的表示。

span.span: No on-screen representation.

summary.span: 聲音或警告物件，或永遠不可見的隱藏視窗可具有這個狀態。

span.span: A sound or alert object would have this state, or a hidden window that is never made visible.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates Pressed = int32(8)
Pressed = 8

summary.span: 按下的物件。

span.span: A pressed object.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates Protected = int32(536870912)
Protected = 536870912

summary.span: 密碼保護的編輯控制項。

span.span: A password-protected edit control.

ReadOnly = 64

summary.span: 唯讀的物件。

span.span: A read-only object.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates Selectable = int32(2097152)
Selectable = 2097152

summary.span: 可接受選取項目的物件。

span.span: An object that can accept selection.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates Selected = int32(2)
Selected = 2

summary.span: 選取的物件。

span.span: A selected object.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates SelfVoicing = int32(524288)
SelfVoicing = 524288

summary.span: 物件或子系可使用文字到語音 (TTS) 的方式來自我描述。

span.span: The object or child can use text-to-speech (TTS) to describe itself.

summary.span: 當具有這個狀態的物件擁有焦點時，因為物件會自動宣告有關本身的資訊，所以語音為主的輔助工具不應宣告資訊。

span.span: A speech-based accessibility aid should not announce information when an object with this state has the focus, because the object automatically announces information about itself.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates Sizeable = int32(131072)
Sizeable = 131072

summary.span: 可調大小的物件。

span.span: A sizable object.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates Traversed = int32(8388608)
Traversed = 8388608

summary.span: 先前已選取的已連結物件。

span.span: A linked object that has previously been selected.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates Unavailable = int32(1)
Unavailable = 1

summary.span: 不可用的物件。

span.span: An unavailable object.

summary.span: 有效的物件。

span.span: A valid object.
